name: Volcanic Panic (JIshwa01)
description:
In Volcanic Panic, you play a scientist working out of a lab at Olympus Mons, after an accident the lab collapses, and using a jetpack you must try to get to the highest point possible. Players move left and right using the A and D keys and Space Bar to activate the jetpack propelling them upward. Players avoid gas clouds, lava geysers, and falling rocks along the way up while navigating a randomly generated vertical environment. Volcanic Panic is a 2d platformer, where the player's goal is to get as high as possible while avoiding falling rocks and gas clouds while utilizing items to restore fuel.

This is a team project made in 3 weeks for college.
